name: 胡國英
objective:
集總電路和克希荷夫定律（KCL, KVL），電路元件，串、並聯
電路，一階電路，二階電路，線性非時變電路分析，相量及
弦波穩態分析，耦合元件和電路，多相電路，複數頻率，頻
率響應，狀態變數法，雙埠網路，PSPICE 模擬，傅式分析及轉換，
拉式轉換。
(1) Lamped Circuit and KCL&KVL; (2) Circuit Components; (3) Series and Parallel Circuits; (3) First-Order Circuit; (4) Second-Order Circuit; (5) Linear Time-Invarying Circuit Analysis; (6) Phasor and Sinusoidal Analysis; (7) Coupling Components and Circuits; (8) Three-Phase Circuits; (9) Complex Frequency; (10) Frequency Response; (11) State Variable Method; (12) Two-Port Network; (13) PSPICE Simulation; (14) Fourier Series and Transform; (15) Laplace Transform
schedule:
第一週 (First Week)：Sinusoidal Steady-State Analysis
第二週 (Second Week)：Sinusoidal Steady-State Analysis
第三週 (Third Week)：Sinusoidal Steady-State Power Calculations
第四週 (Fourth Week)：Balanced Three-Phase Circuits
第五週 (Fifth Week)：Introduction to the Laplace Transform
第六週 (Sixth Week)：The Laplace Transform in Circuit Analysis
第七週 (Seventh Week)：The Laplace Transform in Circuit Analysis
第八週 (Eighth Week)：Introduction to Frequency Selective Circuits
第九週 (Ninth Week)：Introduction to Frequency Selective Circuits; Middle Test
第十週 (Tenth Week)：Active Filter Circuit
第十一週 (Eleventh Week)：Active Filter Circuit
第十二週 (Twelfth Week)：Fourier Series
第十三週 (Thirteenth Week)：Fourier Series
第十四週 (Fourteenth Week)：The Fourier Transform
第十五週 (Fifteenth Week)：The Fourier Transform
第十六週 (Sixteenth Week)：Two-Port Circuits
第十七週 (Seventeenth Week)：Two-Port Circuits
第十八週 (Eighteenth Week)：Final Test
scorePolicy:
期中考 (Midterm) 40%
期末考 (Final) 40%
小考 (Quizes) 20%
materials:
Book: ELECTRIC CIRCUITS
Rev.: Tenth Edition
Authors: James W. Nilsson and Susan A. Riedel
Publisher: PERSON and Prentice Hall
